Export.Routine:
INERECHIMPORT ;INERECHIMPORT;FIS;IMPORT COSTS ALLOCATION;25736;09.01.2004 #include INConst ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; IMPORT COSTS ALLOCATION ; Draws table below INERECH form (AfterData) ; ; Called By : ; INERECHA ; INSHIPINFOCOSTS ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; YKEY ; YFELD objINERECH ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 13-Oct-2006 GRF SR15107: Temp warning message ; 03-Jul-2006 GRF SR14471: Doco; YCR cleanup ; 05.10.2004 FAN 26434; EINGANGSRECHNUNGSKONTROLL ; 09-Jan-2004 FIS 25736 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW LIEF,IMPORT,TYPE,YDATEI,YDDSATZ,SUMM,ANZM,SATZ,RECH,RECHDAT,ERL,FWAE SET YDDSATZ = 0 SET ERL = 0 SET LIEF = $PIECE(YKEY,",",1) QUIT:LIEF="" SET RECH = $PIECE(YKEY,",",2) QUIT:RECH="" SET RECHDAT = $PIECE(YKEY,",",3) SET IMPORT = $PIECE($GET(YFELD),Y,127) QUIT:IMPORT="" ; Import Costs (Import Number : 9999999) INERECHIMPORT ;------------------+-------------------+------------------+---------------+------------+ ;Cost Type |Prospective Costs %|Allocation Method |Estimated Costs|Actual Costs| HEAD ;------------------+-------------------+------------------+---------------+------------+ ;Calculated Customs| | | $50.00 | $60.00 | COST/ANZ ;Insurance |5% Value Of Goods |Apportion By Value| $70.00 | $75.00 | ;------------------+-------------------+------------------+---------------+------------+ ; | | | $120.00 | $135.00 | SUMM ;------------------+-------------------+------------------+---------------+------------+ ; Secondary tables <= AUFTRAG^INSHIPINFOCOSTS WRITE YCR WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(33965) ; "Import Costs" WRITE " ("_$$^WWWFELDNAME("INSHIPINFO","P",1)_": "_IMPORT_")" WRITE "" write "" do TempWarning(IMPORT) ; 13-Oct-2006 DO HEAD DO COST ;ERFASSTE POSITIONEN DO SUMM DO ^WWWFRAME(1) ;IF $G(YAUSWAHL)=1 Q ;RUF VON ^INERECHCHECK;FAN;;05.10.2004;26434 NEW YKEY,YFELD SET TYPE="" FOR SET TYPE=$ORDER(^INSHIPINFOCOSTS(YM,IMPORT,TYPE)) QUIT:TYPE="" DO . SET YFELD=$GET(^INSHIPINFOCOSTS(YM,IMPORT,TYPE,1)) . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,6)'=LIEF QUIT ;WRONG SUPPLIER . SET YKEY=IMPORT_","_TYPE . DO AUFTRAG^INSHIPINFOCOSTS QUIT /*vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START SET YDDSATZ=0 NEW FWAE,YKEY,YDATEI,YSONDLIEF SET FWAE="" WRITE YCR write "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(32159) ;RECHNUNGSPOSITIONEN WRITE YCR WRITE "" write "" WRITE YCR SET YDATEI="INERECH1" SET YKEY=LIEF_","_RECH_","_RECHDAT DO KOPF^INERECHA DO POS^INERECHA ;POSITIONEN DO SUMM^INERECHA WRITE YCR DO ^WWWFRAME(1) QUIT ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END */ ; vvvvv TempWarning(IMPORT) new AUF,blnFound,idInvNum,idSupplier,idxIMPORT,POS set blnFound = 0 set idxIMPORT = $$^WWWUMLAU(IMPORT,1) set AUF="" for { set AUF=$order(^INAUFPAs(YM,2,idxIMPORT,AUF)) quit:AUF="" set POS="" for { set POS=$order(^INAUFPAs(YM,2,idxIMPORT,AUF,POS)) quit:POS="" set idSupplier = "" for { set idSupplier = $order(^INERECH1(YM,AUF,POS,idSupplier)) quit:idSupplier="" set idInvNum = "" for { set idInvNum = $order(^INERECH1(YM,AUF,POS,idSupplier,idInvNum)) quit:idInvNum="" if idInvNum'["#" set blnFound = 1 quit:blnFound } quit:blnFound } quit:blnFound } quit:blnFound } if 'blnFound { write "
" write "   SUPPLIER INVOICE NOT YET POSTED - DO NOT UPDATE ACTUAL SHIPPING COSTS YET" write "" } quit ; ^^^^^ HEAD ;HEADER DO ^WWWFRAME(0) ;TABLE AN ;upon WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("INSHIPINFOCOSTS","P",2) ;KOSTENART WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("INSHIPINFOCOSTS","D",10) ;BERECHNUNGSGRUNDLAGE WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("INSHIPINFOCOSTS","D",9) ;AUFTEILUNG WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("INSHIPINFOCOSTS","D",1) ;VORAUSSICHTLICHE KOSTEN ;taste WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWFELDNAME("INSHIPINFOCOSTS","D",2) ;TATSÃ„CHLISTE KOSTEN ;taste WRITE "" WRITE "",YCR QUIT ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- COST ;ERFASSTE POSITIONEN ANZEIGEN ;display SET SUMM=0 SET SUMT=0 SET ANZM=0 SET TYPE="" FOR SET TYPE=$ORDER(^INSHIPINFOCOSTS(YM,IMPORT,TYPE)) QUIT:TYPE="" DO . SET SATZ=$GET(^INSHIPINFOCOSTS(YM,IMPORT,TYPE,1)) . IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,6)'=LIEF QUIT ;WRONG SUPPLIER . DO ANZ QUIT ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SUMM ;ENDSUMME ANZEIGEN ;display DO ; "DO" is not necessary . WRITE "" . SET YDDSATZ=YDDSATZ+1 . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . ;WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(350)_":" ;SUMME . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(SUMM,0,2,YWHR) ;SUMME ;sum . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "" . WRITE "" . WRITE $$^WWWZAHL(SUMT,0,2,YWHR) ;SUMME ;sum . WRITE " " . WRITE "" . ; . WRITE "",YCR QUIT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------- ANZ ;ANZEIGE DER POSITION ;Show the line NEW YKEY,YFKEY,WECOLOR SET ANZM=ANZM+1 WRITE "" SET YDDSATZ=YDDSATZ+1 ;KOSTENART ;---------------------------------------- WRITE "" IF $get(ID)'=1 DO ;INERECHCHECK;FAN;EINGANGSRECHNUNGSKONTROLL ;05.10.2004;26434 . WRITE "" WRITE "" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^INPARA(YM,"KOSTENARTEN",SPRACHE,TYPE,1)),Y,1) WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "" ;BERECHNUNGSGRUNDLAGE ;---------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" IF $GET(ID)'=1 DO ;INERECHCHECK;FAN;EINGANGSRECHNUNGSKONTROLL ;05.10.2004;26434 . WRITE "" IF +$PIECE(SATZ,Y,11)'="" IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,10)=0 WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(SATZ,Y,11),0,$LENGTH($PIECE($PIECE(SATZ,Y,11),".",2)))_"% " IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,10)'="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"CONTCOSTTYPE",SPRACHE,$PIECE(SATZ,Y,10),1)),Y,1) WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "" ;ALLOCATION ;---------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" IF $GET(ID)'=1 DO ;INERECHCHECK;FAN;EINGANGSRECHNUNGSKONTROLL ;05.10.2004;26434 . WRITE "" IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,9)'="" WRITE $PIECE($GET(^WWW101(0,"KOSTENZUORDNUNG",SPRACHE,$PIECE(SATZ,Y,9),1)),Y,1) WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "" ;ESTIMATED COSTS ;---------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" IF $GET(ID)'=1 DO ;INERECHCHECK;FAN;EINGANGSRECHNUNGSKONTROLL ;05.10.2004;26434 . WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(SATZ,Y,1),0,2,YWHR) SET SUMM=SUMM+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,1) WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "" ;COSTS ;---------------------------------------- WRITE "" WRITE "" IF $GET(ID)'=1 DO ;INERECHCHECK;FAN;EINGANGSRECHNUNGSKONTROLL ;05.10.2004;26434 . WRITE "" WRITE $$^WWWZAHL($PIECE(SATZ,Y,2),0,2,YWHR) SET SUMT=SUMT+$PIECE(SATZ,Y,2) WRITE "" WRITE " " WRITE "" WRITE "",YCR QUIT
